title:
Eigenfunctions expansion for discrete symplectic systems with general
  linear dependence on spectral parameter
abstract:
Eigenfunctions expansion for discrete symplectic systems on a finite discrete
interval is established in the case of a general linear dependence on the
spectral parameter as a significant generalization of the Expansion theorem
given by Bohner, Do\v{s}l\'{y} and Kratz in [Trans. Amer. Math. Soc. 361
(2009), 3109--3123]. Subsequently, an integral representation of the
Weyl--Titchmarsh $M({\lambda})$-function is derived explicitly by using a
suitable spectral function and a possible extension to the half-line case is
discussed. The main results are illustrated by several examples.
